metadata.description: Spells that gather information about air, weather, and atmospheric phenomena

spells.name: Winds of Mundane Silence
spells.description: Allows the caster to hear conversations and sounds carried on the wind from great distances. The caster can focus on specific voices or areas.

spells.name: Eyes of the Soaring Eagle
spells.description: Grants the ability to see from great heights as if flying, providing an aerial view of the surrounding landscape within several miles.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (aerial vision), +0 Personal, +2 Sun, +3 Vision, +1 Animal requisite

spells.name: Predict the Weather
spells.description: Allows the caster to accurately predict weather patterns for the next several days by reading atmospheric signs and air currents.

spells.name: Scent on the Autumn Wind
spells.description: Allows the caster to detect and identify scents carried on the wind from great distances, including tracking specific individuals by their unique scent.

spells.name: True Sight of the Air
spells.description: Allows the caster to see air currents, wind patterns, and atmospheric disturbances as visible streams and flows of different colors.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (see air currents), +0 Personal, +2 Sun, +3 Vision

spells.name: Words Carried on the Wind
spells.description: Allows the caster to hear specific words or phrases spoken anywhere within a large area, as if the wind carries the words directly to them.

spells.name: Sense the Magical Aura
spells.description: Detects the presence and strength of magical auras in the surrounding air, revealing areas of magical significance or recent spellcasting.
spells.guidelines: Base 4 (detect magic), +0 Personal, +1 Concentration, +1 Vim requisite

spells.name: Breath of the Honest Man
spells.description: Detects lies by sensing changes in the target's breathing patterns and the air around them when they speak falsehoods.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (detect deception), +2 Voice, +1 Concentration, +1 Mentem requisite

spells.name: Message of the Distant Voice
spells.description: Allows the caster to hear what someone is saying at a distant location through an arcane connection, as if the wind carries their voice.

spells.name: Secrets of the Storm Clouds
spells.description: Reveals the nature and intensity of storms, including when they will arrive, how severe they will be, and whether they carry magical influences.

spells.name: Flight of the Carried Message
spells.description: Allows the caster to send their consciousness riding on the wind, experiencing flight and observing distant locations from the air.
spells.guidelines: Base 20 (consciousness projection), +0 Personal, +1 Concentration, +1 Mentem requisite
